project.name: Task Management App
project.description: Backlog for testing project management features

backlog.title: User registration
backlog.description: As a user, I want to create an account so that I can access the application.

backlog.title: User login
backlog.description: As a user, I want to log in securely using my credentials.

backlog.title: Password reset
backlog.description: As a user, I want to reset my password if I forget it.

backlog.title: Create task
backlog.description: As a user, I want to create tasks so that I can organize my work.

backlog.title: Delete task
backlog.description: As a user, I want to delete a task I no longer need.
